reviews.text: You can get trains there, strangly & counter staff are helpful

Poor level of customer service. Watched young lady miss train due to over zealous staff trying to get delayed train out too quickly. She was on platform and went to far end of train but doors locked and waved away whilst she tried to get on. Shameful behaviour from staff. Beware

The receptionist was really friendly and helpful but the ticket officer at the station, was  rude and racist he made me feel uncomfortable  and like I did something  wrong. I wanted to ask the train manager a question and he said you can't. They made me fell unwelcomed.
Chesterfield train statiin is a joke. I was there 20 minutes to be told it was leaving from a different platform as it was late.

Couldn’t care less staff and outside of station is filthy with litter everywhere. Cash machine rarely works and no staff at ticket office after 7pm. Whole place needs upgrading as it looks like it’s from 1970’s
